entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 14 %
Dewpoint: -15.9°C
Wind: S 17 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
